<center>
<span class = "primerapalabra">T</span>hat well known dress <br>
Tied to your skin, <br>
Facing the wind, <br>
Shining in the street. <br>
Orange it was, <br>
Subtle, no bluffing, <br>
Never been so charmed, <br>
Tonight, <br>
I'm the lucky.
